channel.title: Soul Split(PI) Cache not auto downloading
channel.description:
It's very strange i keeped the the cache it's name and added the direct dl link to the cachedownloader.java... and when it comes to requesting title screen i get the connection error :/.
Will rep if you can help ^^.

item.title: Soul Split(PI) Cache not auto downloading
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

easyupload but thats also a direct download.
Only thing i changed was in the sprite.java

was adding this : Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+“background.png”);
And deleted whatever it was before.
After that i went to my cache folder went to sprites and placed the background.png there.
Then zipped the cache and uploaded it.
